TopicTitle: Making a big ship one part?

Articles.Content:
Is there a mod that allows to turn something into one part?

I have a plane that is 600 parts and very laggy.

Is there a mod that allows to turn something into one part?

I have a plane that is 600 parts and very laggy.

Maybe not one part, but there is one that lets you merge sequential parts, like tank stacks, into one part. You should at least be able to greatly reduce the part count with that.

Maybe not one part, but there is one that lets you merge sequential parts, like tank stacks, into one part. You should at least be able to greatly reduce the part count with that.

Thanks, could you maybe give me the link?
This affair about add-ons has been moved to Add-on Affairs.
